name: Likho
description: The Likho is a medium-sized monstrosity with a robust build, known for its chaotic and evil demeanor. It possesses high dexterity and charisma, enhancing its agility and social manipulation capabilities.
memorable: The Likho is unique due to its powerful Disruptive Gaze ability that can severely hinder opponents in combat.
goals: The Likho seeks to disrupt opponents and manipulate situations to its advantage, often through chaotic means.
relations: Likhos may be encountered alongside other chaotic creatures or as companions to evil spellcasters.
environment: Likhos are found in areas of chaos, particularly in dark forests or ruined places.
strengths: Highly agile with advantages against spells due to Magic Resistance, and capable of strategic communication with Limited Telepathy.
weaknesses: Relatively average intelligence may limit its strategic capabilities.
attacks: The Likho uses four Claw attacks and a Disruptive Gaze to impair its enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Disruptive Gaze causes targets to have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
senses: The Likho has a passive perception of 16, allowing it to maintain awareness of its surroundings.
skills: It excels in Stealth and Acrobatics due to its high Dexterity.
additional_information: Limited Telepathy allows it to transmit messages within 120 feet.
Pounce ability enables knocking targets prone for additional attacks.
Magic Resistance gives it an edge against spell attacks.
test_queries: medium chaotic evil monster with claws
agile monster with disruptive gaze ability
creature that uses limited telepathy in combat
monster that knocks foes prone with claws
deceptive skirmisher in dark forest environments
